job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: Qualifications<br>- Proficient with systems thinking, able to write software with code in a language that allows them to be successful in: JavaScript, NextJS, ReactJS, TypeScript, GraphQL (Apollo), MongoDB<br><br>Responsibilities<br>- What ongoing activities is the role responsible for?<br>- Making the software systems that allows users to be successful in Murmur.<br>- Talking to users to better understand the connection between what is being built and maintained and what is adding or reducing value in the market.<br>- Observing the software systems to optimize the implementation level of Murmur.<br>- Tending the software systems to keep them easy to reason about.<br>- Collaborating cross-functionally with other roles in Murmur in making decisions about features and functionalities of Murmur.<br>- Building resilient software through writing tests and documentation. <br>- Documenting how and why the software systems are built the way they are.
